unsigned nChoosek( unsigned n, unsigned k )
{
    if (k > n) return 0;
    if (k * 2 > n) k = n-k;
    if (k == 0) return 1;

    int result = n;
    for( int i = 2; i <= k; ++i ) {
        result *= (n-i+1);
        result /= i;
    }
    return result;
}

long int a[100002];
long long int visited[100002];
vector <long long int> list[100002];
int bfs(long long int i)
{
	queue <long long int> q;
	q.push(i);
	visited[i]=1;
	long int c=a[i];
	while(!q.empty())
	{
		int k=q.front();
		q.pop();
		for(long long int j=0;j<list[k].size();j++)
		{
			if(visited[list[k][j]]==0)
			{
				q.push(list[k][j]);
				visited[list[k][j]]=1;
				c=min(c,a[list[k][j]]);
			}
		}
	}
	return c;
}



int main()
{
    
    long int t;
    long int n,m;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        memset(visited,0,sizeof(visited));
        for(long int i=0;i<=100001;i++)
            list[i].clear();
        scanf("%d %d",&n,&m);
        
        for(long int i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%ld",&a[i]);
        }
        long int x,y;
        while(m--)
        {
            scanf("%d %d",&x,&y);
            list[x].push_back(y);
            list[y].push_back(x);
        }
        long int count1=0;
        long long int count2=1;
        
        for(long int i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            if(!visited[i])
            {
                count1+=(bfs(i));
            }
        }
        printf("%ld\n",count1);
        
        
    }
    


return(0);    
}
